title: LF Top laner
body:
We have a team set for flex queues but we never have the 5th man 
we are not a set team and we dont stick to our roles 100% but a top laner would be nice
the people in the team right now is:
Top- 
Jg-matamierda
Mid-WillemoLeKumshot
Adc-Bleach Mouthwash... me
Supp-Sebastation

We have Skype for communications and our club is called [F2P] meaning free to plays
We are low bronze but we think if we get a good team comp we can all climb 
we are not complete crap
add me on league if interested ill mssg you back as soon as possible.
